## Vector2.axisNY() method

Creates a new Vector2 pointing in the negative direction of the Y axis, i.e. vec2(0, -1)

**Signature:**

```typescript
static axisNY(): Vector2;
```
**Returns:**

[Vector2](doc/markdown/./base.vector2.md)

The new vector
